segments.text: You ’ Ve been a sales manager for three years . How do you like the job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If I may ask , are you happy with your salary ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I don ’ t mind at all . I receive 3,000 RIB a month , after tax .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there a bonus system or any other incentive plan in place ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m afraid there isn ’ t . My boss only pays lip service .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What is your salary expectation for this position ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My expectation is in the 3800 to 4500 RIB range . That ’ s the take-home pay .
segments.speaker: S2
